scripts.start: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.start:live: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node live.js
scripts.start:poker: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scanRake.js
scripts.dev: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node index.js
scripts.dev:live: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node live.js
scripts.dev:poker: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scanRake.js
scripts.test: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node index.js
scripts.test:live: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node live.js
scripts.test:poker: npm i && node clear.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node scanRake.js
